`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:"Tree class"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\she34\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-325f0419-65c1-4809-a116-82aad0a874f6.mdx",lineNumber:48,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(a.pre,{children:(0,l.jsxDEV)(a.code,{className:"language-js",children:`class Tree {\r
  constructor() {\r
    this.root = null; // \uD2B8\uB9AC\uC758 \uB8E8\uD2B8 \uB178\uB4DC\r
  }\r
\r
  // \uB8E8\uD2B8\uB97C \uC124\uC815\uD558\uB294 \uBA54\uC11C\uB4DC\r
  setRoot(node) {\r
    this.root = node;\r
  }\r
\r
  // \uD2B8\uB9AC\uC758 \uB8E8\uD2B8\uB97C \uAC00\uC838\uC624\uB294 \uBA54\uC11C\uB4DC\r
  getRoot() {\r
    return this.root;\r
  }\r
\r
  // \uC0C8\uB85C\uC6B4 \uB178\uB4DC\uB97C \uC0DD\uC131\uD558\uB294 \uBA54\uC11C\uB4DC\r
  makeNode(left, value, right) {\r
    const node = new Node();\r
    node.left = left;\r
    node.value = value;\r
    node.right = right;\r
    return node;\r
  }\r
\r
  // \uC911\uC704 \uC21C\uD68C\r
  inorderTraversal(node) {\r
    if (node !== null) {\r
      this.inorder(node.left);\r
      console.log(node.value);\r
      this.inorder(node.right);\r
    }\r
  }\r
\r
  // \uC804\uC704 \uC21C\uD68C\r
  preorderTraversal(node) {\r
    if (node !== null) {\r
      console.log(node.value);\r
      this.inorder(node.left);\r
      this.inorder(node.right);\r
    }\r
  }\r
\r
  // \uD6C4\uC704 \uC21C\uD68C\r
  postorderTraversal(node) {\r
    if (node !== null) {\r
      this.inorder(node.left);\r
      this.inorder(node.right);\r
      console.log(node.value);\r
    }\r
  }\r
}
